001package pkg_class;
002
003/**
004 * This class is part of the RPandaScape application. 
005 * RPandaScape is a very simple, text based adventure game. 
006 * 
007 * It interpret the command given by the parser and execute it.
008 * 
009 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes + Elie DUBOUX
010 * @version 2003.01 + 2019 + 2021.01
011 */
012public class GameEngine
013{
014    /**
015     * The parser used to catch the commands typed by the player.
016     */
017    private Parser aParser;
018    /**
019     * The graphical user interface.
020     */
021    private UserInterface aGui;
022    /**
023     * The game model.
024     */
025    private GameModel aGameModel;
026
027    /**
028     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine.
029     * @param pGameModel The game model.
030     */
031    public GameEngine(final GameModel pGameModel)
032    {
033        this.aGameModel = pGameModel;
034        this.aParser = new Parser();
035    }//GameEngine()
036
037    /**
038     * Initialise the graphical user interface.
039     * @param pUserInterface The user interface.
040     */
041    public void setGUI(final UserInterface pUserInterface)
042    {
043        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
044        this.aGui.printWelcome();
045    }//setGUI()
046    
047    /**
048     * Given a command, process (that is: execute) the command.
049     * 
050     * @param pCommandLine The line typed by the player.
051     */
052    public void interpretCommand(final String pCommandLine) 
053    {
054        this.aGui.println("> " + pCommandLine);
055        Command vCommand = this.aParser.getCommand(pCommandLine);
056        
057        if (vCommand == null) 
058        {
059            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
060            return;
061        }
062        
063        vCommand.setGui(this.aGui);
064        vCommand.execute(this.aGameModel.getPlayer());
065    }//interpretCommand()
066}//GameEngine
